thread.title: Nike Unveils All-New LeBron Soldier 10 FlyEase
thread.title_full: Nike Unveils All-New LeBron Soldier 10 FlyEase

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Nike Unveils All-New LeBron Soldier 10 FlyEase
text:
Visit the original post to see all 3 images from this gallery. 
Brand: Nike
Model: LeBron Soldier 10 FlyEase
Key Features: Lace-free entry system, zipper pull around ankle, expanded midfoot and heel counter opening.
Release Date: March 20, 2017
Availability: Nike.com 
Editor’s Notes: The all-new LeBron Soldier 10 FlyEase is designed to provide quick and easy accessibility to everyone, regardless of disability. The lace-free sneaker features a revamped zipper construction and a more convenient pull around the ankle.
You can go ahead and purchase the royal blue LeBron Soldier 10 FlyEase in both kids and adult sizes; see the link above.
For more Swoosh heat, take a look at the brand’s Aqua Sock update, the Aqua Sock 360 .
Subscribe to Highsnobiety’s sneaker chatbot on Facebook to receive lightning quick updates on release dates, sneaker street style, shopping tips and more.
